title: Labor Secretary Perez: We Need A Safety Net For Gig Economy Workers
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Business - Today 
Labor Secretary Thomas Perez believes workers in the gig economy need a social safety net, he told HuffPost Live on Friday. "We can build...
